markdownRemark.html:
This post talks about a key factor to CUDA kernel performace: accessing data in the globle memory.

Global Memory Bandwidth

CUDA applications tend to process a massive amount of data from the global memory within a short period of time. Tiling techniques are engineered that utilize shared memories to reduce the total amount of data that must be accessed from the global memory

Memory Coalescing
